reviewText: Overall the movie was good, well done and had a good story line. Was a little surprised at some of the language from Diane Keaton at times, but I guess it was in keeping with the subject matter and struggles she was going through.
Love the movie. But excuse me this movie has been out for a long time and charging 45.00 to buy is well not good of a movie.
One of my very favorite movies!

ok. i am a suker for pirate movies. this one sucks. none of it really made sense. caesar's boats looked they had been made in peru from reeds. the only other remarkable thing about the movie were the peclaces the pirate chief wore.(he was played by gordon mitchell. most of the action in the movie was his flexing his pecs.) and, the playback was horrible.

now, the good part. i received an email from amazon saying they had noticed the poor playback and were refunding my money. excellent. (and i shouldcsay that if the sound had been better synched with the action, it might have been somewhat less obtuse.)
